definition: to be in/to lie in/to consist in/to depend on/to rest with
(located) at/(to be) in/to exist/in the middle of doing sth/(indicating an action in progress)
the whole year must be planned for in the spring (idiom)/early planning is the key to success
pinyin: yi1 nian2 zhi1 ji4 zai4 yu2 chun1

definition: make your day's plan early in the morning (idiom)/early morning is the golden time of the day
pinyin: yi1 ri4 zhi1 ji4 zai4 yu2 chen2

definition: life is motion (popular saying with many possible interpretations)/Physical effort is vital for our bodies to function (Aristotle)./Life derives from physical exercise.
pinyin: sheng1 ming4 zai4 yu2 yun4 dong4

sentences.english: The main difficulty of off-line handwritten signature verification is feature extraction.
sentences.chinese: 離線手寫簽名鑑別的主要困難在於簽名特徵的提取。

sentences.english: The fear of the Lord, which is the beginning of wisdom, consists in a complete devotion to God.
sentences.chinese: 敬畏耶和華是智慧的開端，是在於完全委身於神。

sentences.english: Case of the table with the biggest difference is that dioica and face.
sentences.chinese: 案，案與桌的最大不同，在於腿子和麪的關係。

sentences.english: One of the disadvantages of the phenothiazines is their potential for dystonic effects.
sentences.chinese: 吩噻嗪類藥物弊端在於其潛在的張力不能反應。

sentences.english: It aims to improve the useability of sensor uncertain data stream and gain more information from it.
sentences.chinese: 目的在於從不確定傳感器數據流中獲得更多有用信息。

sentences.english: The reason flu keeps infecting us again and again is that the virus is constantly changing.
sentences.chinese: 流感能夠反覆感染我們的原因在於病毒的不斷變化。

sentences.english: Bacteria can be inside an uncracked, whole egg.
sentences.chinese: 細菌也存在於無縫完整的雞蛋內部。

sentences.english: The only difference is that government's shares would be nonvoting until the government sold the shares at a later date.
sentences.chinese: 唯一的區別就在於政府在出售股票之前不具有表決權。

sentences.english: Moreover, differences also exist between the pitch radius increasing phases and pitch radius decreasing phases.
sentences.chinese: 此外，這種差異也存在於節徑增加和節徑減少階段。

sentences.english: The key to following your heart is to learn to deal with fear.
sentences.chinese: 要做到心隨所願，祕訣在於學會克服恐懼。

sentences.english: All of this with only natural talent.
sentences.chinese: 所有這一切只在於他的自然天賦。

sentences.english: The advantage of Microsoft's method is that it works better for on-screen reading.
sentences.chinese: 微軟的做法的好處在於它更利於屏幕閱讀。

sentences.english: I thrust-weight book is exactly the reason.
sentences.chinese: 筆者推重此書，原因正在於此。

sentences.english: Bone cells or osteocytes are contained in spaces called lacunae.
sentences.chinese: 骨骼細胞或者是骨細胞存在於叫做空隙的空間裏。

sentences.english: The problem with technological predictions is that they are almost always solution-driven.
sentences.chinese: 技術預測的問題在於，這種預測總是受解決方法驅使。

sentences.english: And so the only two differences are, right there, and there versus here and here.
sentences.chinese: 因此這兩塊代碼的不同之處，就僅僅在於位置不同了。

definition: whether or not (at the end of a phrase)
to run in the opposite direction (idiom); to run counter to
as for/as to/to go so far as to
to display/to exhibit/to bring out implicit or innate qualities/to express (a thought or moral)/to develop (an idea)/to elaborate (on a theme)
to present clearly/to give prominence to/to magnify/clear and obvious
difference/to distinguish/to discriminate/to make a distinction/CL:個|个[ge4]
